attr.title: Tile World
attr.desc:
Tile World is a source port clone of Chip's Challenge.

Handheld edition based on: https://github.com/senquack/tileworld-for-handhelds 
Updated to use 640x480: https://github.com/Slayer366/tileworld-for-handhelds
attr.inst: Everything is included and ready to run.  Just launch the original Tile World (Chip's Challenge) or one of the theme mods and play!
